IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.remove_building') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.remove_building GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.remove_building @building_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
DELETE FROM dbo.Building_Equip_Item_Infos WHERE building_id = @building_id
DELETE FROM dbo.Building_Inventories WHERE building_id = @building_id
DELETE FROM dbo.Building_Select_Recipe_Production_Infos WHERE building_id= @building_id
DELETE FROM dbo.Buildings WHERE id= @building_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
